short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add persistent line bookmarks with notes on different places on a page and easily scroll between them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I canâ€™t count the times I have wanted to easily scroll back to a certain line while reading a long page without wasting a couple of seconds to find it. Therefore, I created this extension that lets me easily pin lines I am interested in and find them later immediately using a simple shortcut. I even made them have notes and be persistent :).
Persistent means that they stay on the page even if I exit chrome or shut down my computer until I remove them myself ensuring I never lose important information.

So being the awesome fellow I am, I am sharing it with everyone.
